lines.text: ...Hm. Maybe the obvious answer... is that the fire did exactly what it was supposed to do.
It wasn't to set the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard</c> on fire- that was an accident.
The point of setting the hay on fire... was to get rid of the hay!
...Makes sense. But what would the point of that be?
Hard to say. What sort of problem could having hay around cause for them?
Maybe... Slick was there to steal the hay!
And he set it on fire, so that Slick wouldn't have anything to steal, and he'd leave!
Slick Emmup was known far and wide as the Hay Bale Bandit, so that makes a lot of sense.
Well, okay, I can't think of a reason they'd need to get rid of the hay.
